attributes.action: ask Prince William to let Bryan Adams play at Diana's concert
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The best rocker in the world is being refused the chance to entertain us at the gig for the woman he once loved.  Bad karma man.  Please Tony, she would have wanted him to sing 69 for her.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
